duties_responsibilities.duty: Create a first-class customer experience through flawless customer service and visual merchandising presentations in The North Face Shops within our stores.
Coordinate and execute weekly merchandising priorities, provide weekly communication to teammates, and partners regarding ongoing projects.
Ensure visual merchandising collateral is received at the store and maintain visual merchandising areas within the store at exceptional levels.
Lead seasonal floor set changes with direction from Customer Service Center partners, Store Leadership, and The North Face team.
Identify key styles and make appropriate recommendations to drive sales and increase inventory turn.
Coordinate seasonal technical rep training requests for Store Management and Teammates.
Complete all assigned customer service and product training, attend store meetings, and external clinics.
Adhere to established policies and procedures related to safety, loss prevention, and standard operating procedures. Maintain confidentiality of all Company information.
Support the team across the store and perform other tasks as assigned by management.
